apiClassifier.shortdesc: The StackFrame class provides access to the properties of a data block containing a function.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The StackFrame class provides access to the properties of a data block containing a function. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Converts the StackFrame to a string of its properties.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A string containing the name property, and optionally the file and line properties (if a SWF file is being debugged) of the StackFrame object. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Converts the StackFrame to a string of its properties.

apiValue.shortdesc: The function name in the stack frame.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The function name in the stack frame. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiValue.shortdesc: The identifier for the script function in the application being profiled.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The NewObjectSample class represents objects that are created within a getSamples() stream.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The NewObjectSample class represents objects that are created within a getSamples() stream. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiValue.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiValue.shortdesc: The Class object corresponding to the object created within a getSamples() stream.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The Class object corresponding to the object created within a getSamples() stream. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiValue.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiValue.shortdesc: The NewObjectSample object if it still exists.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The NewObjectSample object if it still exists. If the object has been garbage collected, this property is undefined and a corresponding DeleteObjectSample exists. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiValue.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The NewObjectSample object size. If the object has been garbagecollected, this property is undefined and a corresponding DeleteObjectSample exists. For FlashPlayer debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Clears the current set of Sample objects.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Clears the current set of Sample objects. This method is usually called after calling getSamples() and iterating over the Sample objects. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the number of times a get function was executed.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The number of times a get method was executed.

apiParam.apiDesc: A method instance or a class.
If qname is undefined return the number of iterations of the constructor function.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the number of times a get function was executed. Use isGetterSetter() to verify that you have a get/set function before you use getGetterInvocationCount(). For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the number of times a method was executed.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The number of times a method was executed.

apiParam.apiDesc: A method instance or a class. A class can be used to get the invocation count of instance functions when a method instance isn't available. If obj is undefined, this method returns the count of the package-scoped function named by qname.
If qname is undefined return the number of iterations of the constructor function.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the number of times a method was executed. If the parameter obj is a Class and the parameter qname is undefined then this method returns the number of iterations of the constructor function. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Exposes the lexical scope of a Function so that captured scope objects (including activation objects and with scopes) are seen by the profiler as being retained by the Function instance.

apiReturn.apiDesc: An array containings all the lexical scope elements

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Exposes the lexical scope of a Function so that captured scope objects (including activation objects and with scopes) are seen by the profiler as being retained by the Function instance.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the master string upon which this string depends, or null if this string does not depend on another string.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The string upon which the passed-in string depends, or null if the passed-in string does not depend on another string

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the master string upon which this string depends, or null if this string does not depend on another string. For example, if you call String.substr(), the returned string will often actually be implemented as just a pointer into the original string, for the sake of efficiency. In normal usage, this is an implementation detail which is not visible to the user; however, it can be confusing when using a profiler to analyze your program's memory consumption, because the string may be shown as taking less memory than would be needed for the string's value. In addition, a string might be retained in memory solely because it is the master for other strings. getMasterString() allows profilers to show the user an accurate graph of string dependencies.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns an object containing all members of a specified object, including private members.

apiReturn.apiDesc: An Object that you must iterate over with a for each..in loop to retrieve the QNames for each property.

apiParam.apiDesc: If object is a Class and instanceNames is true report the instance names as if o was an instance of class instead of the class's member names.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns an object containing all members of a specified object, including private members. You can then iterate over the returned object to see all values. This method is similar to the flash.utils.describeType() method but also allows you to see private members and skips the intermediate step of creating an XML object. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the number of samples collected.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the number of samples collected. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns an object of memory usage Sample instances from the last sampling session.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns an object of memory usage Sample instances from the last sampling session. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the saved "this" from a Method closure that you normal can't see from AS.

apiReturn.apiDesc: An object that is the "this" of the MethodClosure

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the saved "this" from a Method closure that you normal can't see from AS.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the number of times a set function was executed.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The number of times a set method was executed.

apiParam.apiDesc: A method instance or a class.
If qname is undefined return the number of iterations of the constructor function.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the number of times a set function was executed. Use isGetterSetter() to verify that you have a get/set function before you use getSetterInvocationCount(). For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the size in memory of a specified object when used with the Flash Player 9.0.115.0 or later debugger version.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The byte count of memory used by the specified object.

apiParam.apiDesc: The object to analyze for memory usage.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the size in memory of a specified object when used with the Flash Player 9.0.115.0 or later debugger version. If used with a Flash Player that is not the debugger version, this method returns 0.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Checks to see if a property is defined by a get/set function.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A Boolean value indicating if the property is defined by a get/set function (true) or not (false).

apiParam.apiDesc: A method instance or a class.
If qname is undefined return the number of iterations of the constructor function.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Checks to see if a property is defined by a get/set function. If you want to use getInvocationCount() on a get/set function for a property, first call isGetterSetter() to check to see if it is a get/set function, and then use either getSetterInvocationCount or getGetterInvocationCount to get the respective counts. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Stops the sampling process momentarily. Restart the sampling process using startSampling(). For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Tells the sampler if it should create NewObjectSamples for internal allocations from the flash player.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Tells the sampler if it should create NewObjectSamples for internal allocations from the flash player. If this is set to true, then every allocation will generate a NewObjectSample. These internal allocs will not have a type, or a reference to the Object. They will have the ActionScript stack trace that triggered the allocation. Defaults to false, which only collects allocations for ActionScript objects.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets a callback function for the sampler - this function will be called when the sample stream is almost exhausted.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets a callback function for the sampler - this function will be called when the sample stream is almost exhausted. This should be used to process samples before the sample buffer is filled. pauseSampling will be called before the callback is called, and startSampling will be called after the callback has been executed.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Begins the process of collecting memory usage Sample objects.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Begins the process of collecting memory usage Sample objects. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiOperation.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiOperation.shortdesc: Ends the process of collecting memory usage Sample objects and frees resources dedicated to the sampling process.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Ends the process of collecting memory usage Sample objects and frees resources dedicated to the sampling process. You start the sampling process with startSampling(). For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiClassifier.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)

apiValue.shortdesc: Contains information about the methods executed by Flash Player over a specified period of time.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Contains information about the methods executed by Flash Player over a specified period of time. The format for the stack trace is similiar to the content shown in the exception dialog box of the Flash Player debugger version. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiValue.shortdesc: The microseconds that define the duration of the Sample instance.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The microseconds that define the duration of the Sample instance. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The DeleteObjectSample class represents objects that are created within a getSamples() stream; each DeleteObjectSample object corresponds to a NewObjectSample object.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The DeleteObjectSample class represents objects that are created within a getSamples() stream; each DeleteObjectSample object corresponds to a NewObjectSample object. For Flash Player debugger version only.

apiValue.domains: (topic ui-d) (topic hi-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ut-d) (topic pr-d api-d)
apiValue.shortdesc: The unique identification number that matches up with a NewObjectSample's identification number.

apiValue.shortdesc: The size of the DeleteObjectSample object before it is deleted.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The size of the DeleteObjectSample object before it is deleted. For Flash Player debugger version only.
